body.name: KE KING Lavan® 1000 MaP Score Powerful Flush Comfort Height Floor Mounted Two-Piece Toilet

byLineInfo.name: Visit the KK KE KING Store

features: Powerful Flushing: Map Score 1000. Experience the unrivaled force of our two-piece toilet, ensuring efficient waste removal with each flush and eliminating the need for repeated plunging.
Beautiful and Elegant Design: Enhance your bathroom aesthetics with the stunning and elegant appearance of our two-piece toilet, adding a touch of sophistication to any decor style.
Reliable Performance: Enjoy peace of mind with the consistent and reliable performance of our two-piece toilet, ensuring its longevity and durability for years to come.
Water Saving: High efficiency (1.28gpf/4.8lpf) operation is Water Sense certified. R&T cUPC certificated water flush valve, 100% Factory flush tested.
Visible Quality: Vitreous china, nice glazed surface inhibits the growth of stain or odor, very easy to maintain. Slow-close toilet seat, no slamming, and no danger of pinching fingers.
body.description: KE KING 1000 MaP Score Elongated Two-Piece Toilet We're on a mission to bring life back to simple and comfortable. With decades in the business, KE KING understands how to engineer the best toilets you can buy. Modern and perfect silhouettes for this toilet will look beautiful and fit your bathroom's style. The glazed surface brings a high-end and pure atmosphere, and it also helps to clean easier. The slow-close toilet seat eliminates the hidden danger of noise and safety.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us KE KING's story began with a dream to provide people with the best bathroom experience possible. Our dedication to excellence has led us to produce a range of products that are not only functional but also beautiful. We've taken a simple concept and turned it into a global brand that's synonymous with quality and luxury. KE KING has everything you need to transform your bathroom into a sanctuary of relaxation and luxury.

High Quality Inside 2" fully-glazed trap-way with 100% factory flush tested. This siphon-flush one-piece toilet uses a state-of-the-art all-glass flush system to give you a super quiet and powerful flush. NO clogs, NO leaks. Soft Closing Toilet Seat Compared to noisy traditional toilet seats, a soft close seat creates almost no noise, making it a great choice to ensure privacy in your bathroom. No need to worry about slamming or pinching fingers. And the bumpers prevent the seat from shifting during use and add stability. Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose This supply line inlet hose of the toilet works for the U.S. standard 7/8'' waterline. An adapter for a 1/2'' waterline is pre-installed. If your supply line size is 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it. Suggested Inlet Valve Location Please note the installation of the full-skirted toilet design. Please select the correct toilet for installation according to the position of the water valve. Incorrect water valve position will cause the toilet to fail to install. It is recommended that the distance of the water valve position. The dimension in the main picture has accurate dimensions for reference only.

HOME, LOVE, LIFE We are committed to providing a 100% satisfactory customer experience. If the product you receive is damaged during transportation, there is no need to return it. Please DM us first. We will send you the replacement or credit. Note: Due to the large size of the product, every toilet will be shipped in two packages. KE KING 1000 MaP Score Elongated Two-Piece Toilet We're on a mission to bring life back to simple and comfortable. With decades in the business, KE KING understands how to engineer the best toilets you can buy. Modern and perfect silhouettes for this toilet will look beautiful and fit your bathroom's style. The glazed surface brings a high-end and pure atmosphere, and it also helps to clean easier. The slow-close toilet seat eliminates the hidden danger of noise and safety.

Certification cUPC, Watersense, ADA Complaint, ASME A112.19.2/CSA B45.1 Compliant MaP Score 1000 Seat height 16 1/2 inches Rough in 12 inches Trapway Diameter 2 inches Flush Valve Diameter 2 inches Trip Lever Placement Left, Chromed Side Flush Button Water Consumption Single Flush: 1.28 GPF Toilet seat material High Quality PP Material Toilet bowl material Vitreous China Style Elongated Two Piece Toilet After-sales Service 24 Hours Online & Answer Your Questions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice toilet
reviews.reviewText: I loved this toilet, unfortunately due to shipping I received it with a crack, I contacted seller and a refund was immediately sent. I highly recommend, as the seller is prompt and stands behind their product. 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look of sturdiness, but didn't fit
reviews.reviewText: Love the look - looks so solid and sturdy. But it didn't fit. Got it for my daughter in New York. She lives in a very old building that there is not enough space between the wall and the toilet sewer line unless cutting off a piece of the wall (impossible). The contractor tried all the tricks nothing worked. The toilet is so big and heavy that she was not even able to return it to the seller. Amazon was kind enough to refund our money without returning the item, and the contractor was kind enough to hall it away for us without charge. Thank God! The lesson to lean for future buyers: measure the space between the wall the toilet sewer line before buying !!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can’t review it when I finally got someone in to install the toilet, the tank was broken so I could not use it. Paid for nothing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars would not fit but to expensive to return it
reviews.reviewText: this toilet did not fit my bathroom fixtures. I tried to return it but refused to pay for return postage
